summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 51st Avenue Southwest, from West College Street to West Wait Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and side sewers together with necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9011 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
